underlying_goal: Verify that problem 3 (In-Memory Database) is fully implemented and passing all tests, fixing any bugs found
friction_detail: Two bugs were found in the existing implementation: deleteDataAt didn't check TTL expiry and restore() did direct key lookup instead of finding latest backup before timestamp.
brief_summary: User asked to test and verify problem 3's implementation; Claude found and fixed two bugs, achieving full test passage and confirming the implementation as ground truth.
